Upcoming Past

    December 2019

    • FronteersConf (CoC)

      03 December 3, 2019 - December 4, 2019
      Amsterdam, the Netherlands

      Fronteers Conference is one of Europe’s premiere conferences on front-end web development, organised in Amsterdam yearly since 2008. This year our single-track community-driven conference returns to the beautiful Pathé Tuschinski theatre on Thursday and Friday, 3–4 October 2019. Our speakers come from all over the globe cover the full spectrum from independent developers to Github and Google team members.

      fronteers.nl Code of Conduct
      Back in Pathé Tuschinski for 2 days with 18 fantastic speakers.
